content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} - I would like to base “robotika” solution on common docker, which would be available for download \(as it used to be\). The one, which is available is 3 months old, which I suppose is a bug. For example:

[#!/osrf/subt/src/urban\_circuit/subt\_ign/include/subt\_ign/CommonTypes.hh](#!/osrf/subt/src/urban_circuit/subt_ign/include/subt_ign/CommonTypes.hh)

surely changed \(Last updated, 2019‑11‑26\} so it is necessary to report new artifacts \(Gas and Vent\).
content.html:
@Alfredo Bencomo - I would like to base “robotika” solution on common docker, which would be available for download (as it used to be). The one, which is available is 3 months old, which I suppose is a bug. For example:

#!/osrf/subt/src/urban_circuit/subt_ign/include/subt_ign/CommonTypes.hh

surely changed (Last updated, 2019‑11‑26} so it is necessary to report new artifacts (Gas and Vent).
